name: Beer Recommender
author: Christoph Eberl & Bernhard Zweim√ºller

sections.description:
With this WordPress Plugin you can easily discover new beers! Just add it to your pages with the shortcode or use it as a widget.

For the API Access you have to register at brewerydb.com and insert your API-Key in the plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload beerrecommender to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the shortcode via the editor in your pages (Beer Icon)

short_description: With this Wordpress Plugin you can easily discover new beers!
